title: Bluetooth contact sharing turning itself off
content:
Hi,
When I connect my phone to my car via Bluetooth, the car sometimes complains that it cannot import the contacts. When I check the Bluetooth settings for my car on my phone I can see that contact sharing is not enabled despite having it enabled before. The other two settings (phone calls and media audio) are always on and never change.
I don't know at what point contact sharing turns itself off or why it does it.
Do you have any ideas as to why this could happen?
Thanks!
